characteristic.description:
ICAR Milk Characteristics Codes and values - we have at this moment SCC, FAT, PROTEIN, LAC, UREA, BLOOD, ACETONE, BHB, LDH, PRO, AVGCOND, MAXCOND, AVGFLWR,  MAXFLWR, WEIGHT.
The following units have to be applied:

|SCC|Somatic cell count|x1000 cells/ml|NCL
|FAT|Fat|%|VP
|PROTEIN|Protein|%|VP
|LAC|Lactose|%|VP
|UREA|Urea|mg/l|M1
|BLOOD|Blood|true/false|A99
|ACETONE|Acetone|mmol/l|M33
|BHB|Beta hydroxybutyrate|mmol/l|M33
|LDH|Lactate dehydrogenase|IU/l|
|PRO|Progesteron|mmol/l|M33
|AVGCOND|Average conductivity value of the milk at 25 ° C|mS/cm|H61
|MAXCOND|Maximum conductivity value of the milk at 25 ° C|mS/cm|H61
|AVGFLWR|Average flow rate|Kg/min|F31
|MAXFLWR|Max flow rate|Kg/min|F31
|WEIGHT|Weight of milk|Kg|KGM
|PAG|Pregnancy associated glycoprotein|mmol/l|M33

value.description: the value of the characteristic measured

unit.description: the defaults are described above, only use this field when differed from the default. Use UN/CEFACT codes.

measuringDevice.description: a more readable device class ID that contains manufacturer, device, hardware and software versions in a way that is similar to the USB specification. This will need more investigation.
